Title: WPF FlowDocument Examples for VS2008 and VS2010
Description: WPF Text Samples (especially FlowDocument) on the various possible effects: sub- and super-script, ruby (a.k.a. furigana), and various others...
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF Text Samples (especially FlowDocument) on the various possible effects: sub- and super-script, ruby (a.k.a. furigana), and various others...

Basic samples for VS2008 and VS2010. Some are taken from MSDN documentation.

My personal special interest is in ruby (a.k.a. Furigana) support. But I also want to collect more samples about FlowDocuments.

Additional support is needed!!!
